name: Courtenay Raia
title: The New Prometheans: Faith, Science, and the Supernatural Mind in the Victorian Fin de Si√®cle
blurb: The Society for Psychical Research was established in 1882 to further the scientific study of consciousness, but it arose in the surf of a larger cultural need. Victorians were on the hunt for self-understanding and a way to reconcile science and sacred truths.
